==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|ぶん|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|じぶん|acc=h}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じぶん}}

# [[oneself]]
# [[I]] (often shows the speaker's lower position in a hierarchy than the addressee)
# {{lb|ja|Kansai}} [[you]]

====Usage notes====
* 自分 means “oneself”, with 自分[[で]] meaning “by oneself, by one’s own efforts”. By contrast, [[一人]][[で]] and [[独り]][[で]] mean rather “alone”. Compare doing an assignment by oneself (without help) versus doing an assignment alone (without any other person around).

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|一人|ひとり}}, {{ja-r|独り|ひとり}}
